issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Add ability for HiveAuthorizer implementations to filter out results of 'show tables', 'show databases'

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Sentry integration with Hive authorization framework V2

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Support metadata filter hook for metastore client. This will be useful for authorization plugins on hiveserver2 to filter metadata results, especially in case of non-impersonation mode where the metastore doesn't know the end user's identity.

The test failed vector_mapjoin_reduce.q seems to be unrelated to the change. It fails with and without the patch.
Patch committed to trunk. Thanks [~brocknoland] for the review!

Doc note:  This adds *hive.metastore.filter.hook* to HiveConf.java, so it needs to be documented in the wiki.

Fix Version/s says 0.14.0 and 0.15.0 but [~prasadm]'s comment just says committed to trunk, so is it only 0.15.0?
